body_html:
We (almost) never change ops, whenever we have to, we instead introduce a new V2 (or V3, or V4) op. That makes sure that old serialized graphdefs keep working.

So in your code, use V2, it's the newest version.
body_text:
We (almost) never change ops, whenever we have to, we instead introduce a new V2 (or V3, or V4) op. That makes sure that old serialized graphdefs keep working.
So in your code, use V2, it's the newest version.
body:
We (almost) never change ops, whenever we have to, we instead introduce a new V2 (or V3, or V4) op. That makes sure that old serialized graphdefs keep working.

So in your code, use V2, it's the newest version.
